title: The Forsaken
description:
Adds an outcast cleric on a mission to fight off the corruption of the Spire. Designed to be similar to the base game characters, The Forsaken aims to power himself up while weakening enemies. 
 -Features:
Unplayed mechanic - Leave a card in your hand to activate bonus effects.
75 custom cards.
10 new relics.

New Update with reworked cards, more card art, and a custom final boss scene.
